front.title: Tauntaun
front.gametext: May add 1 'rider' (passenger). Deploy only on Hoth. Ability = 1/4. May move as a 'react' from a battle. May be 'sacrificed' (lost) to make rider immune to Exposure this turn.
front.lore: First native creature found on Hoth. Roam the icy plans in herds. Illtempered and easily spooked. Smell bad on the outside. Trained as steeds for Rebel patrols.
